statements: SELECT * FROM inventory
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE item_id = 1
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse A'
SELECT item_name FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_items FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY item_name DESC
SELECT item_name, location FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 5 ORDER BY location ASC, item_name ASC
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE item_name LIKE 'S%' AND quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 15
SELECT item_id, location FROM inventory WHERE quantity = (SELECT MAX(quantity) FROM inventory)
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT location) AS num_locations, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory
SELECT * FROM inventory
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT id, location FROM inventory WHERE product_name LIKE 'Apple%'
SELECT * FROM logistics ORDER BY shipment_date DESC
SELECT carrier_name, start_location, end_location FROM logistics WHERE start_location = 'Warehouse A'
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT id, product_name, location FROM inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse' ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM logistics WHERE shipment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY shipment_date ASC
SELECT id, carrier_name, start_location, end_location FROM logistics WHERE carrier_name = 'FedEx' ORDER BY start_location DESC
SELECT id, product_name, quantity, location, shipment_id FROM inventory JOIN logistics ON inventory.id = logistics.id WHERE quantity <= 5 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity > 0
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price <= 50
SELECT * FROM warehouses WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY shipment_date DESC
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM products WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY price
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity ASC
SELECT warehouse_id, location, capacity FROM warehouses WHERE location LIKE 'New%'
SELECT product_id, shipment_date FROM shipments WHERE shipment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY shipment_date ASC
SELECT shipment_id, product_id, quantity FROM shipments WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY shipment_id
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, location FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT shipment_date, quantity, location FROM shipments WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY shipment_date DESC;
SELECT orders.order_date, inventory.product_name, suppliers.supplier_name FROM orders JOIN inventory ON orders.product_id = inventory.id JOIN suppliers ON orders.supplier_id = suppliers.id;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM suppliers WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY supplier_name;
SELECT orders.order_date, inventory.product_name, orders.quantity FROM orders JOIN inventory ON orders.product_id = inventory.id WHERE orders.quantity > 20;
SELECT shipments.shipment_date, suppliers.supplier_name, shipments.quantity FROM shipments JOIN suppliers ON shipments.location = suppliers.location ORDER BY shipments.shipment_date;

SELECT inventory.product_name, inventory.location, shipments.quantity FROM inventory INNER JOIN shipments ON inventory.location = shipments.location WHERE shipments.quantity >= 10 ORDER BY shipments.quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, email, phone_number FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM warehouses WHERE capacity > 1000 ORDER BY warehouse_name ASC;
SELECT t.transporter_id, t.transporter_name, s.shipment_date FROM transporters t INNER JOIN shipments s ON t.transporter_id = s.supplier_id ORDER BY s.shipment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE supplier_id = 3 AND quantity >= 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT p.product_name, s.supplier_name FROM products p INNER JOIN suppliers s ON p.supplier_id = s.supplier_id WHERE p.quantity < 50 AND s.contact_name IS NOT NULL;
SELECT product_id, quantity, shipment_date FROM shipments WHERE warehouse_id = 2 AND quantity > 20 ORDER BY shipment_date ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, email, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
